Text:
Thanks a lot!Ekolb! You are a legend!
Could you please also get the subtitles for these programmes? This can be very useful to the non English speakers and hearing impaired.
Thanks again!
They are not always available.  But I will try it for you. :)

I love you!Ekolb!
Kiss Kiss Kiss

Dear Ekolb

Could you please up part 3 of this documentary.

Regards
